itunes:title: Episode 804 - Special Operators Transition Foundation
title: Episode 804 - Special Operators Transition Foundation
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Lt. Col. Tommy Stoner (U.S. Army, Ret.) of the Special Operators Transition Foundation to talk about the foundation’s work in getting veterans the well-paying, high-level jobs they deserve after their service...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Lt. Col. Tommy Stoner (U.S. Army, Ret.) of the Special Operators Transition Foundation to talk about the foundation’s work in getting veterans the well-paying, high-level jobs they deserve after their service ends as well as why veterans are so uniquely suited to be extraordinary assets to basically any type of company or business, their insanely fun charity golf tournament in Nashville, and how to contribute to the foundation’s continued success. 

 

Visit SOTF.org

 

Go to CardoMAX.com and use promo code DB, and you get Buy One Get One FREE on your first order
